channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump proposed excluding tips from federal taxes. Here’s what that would mean for workers’ take-home pay—and budget deficits
item.description: The Committee for a Responsible Federal Budget, a fiscal watchdog group, has estimated that exempting tips from both income and payroll taxes would reduce federal revenues by $150-$250 billion over the next decade.

item.title: Weight loss drug contender Zealand Pharma jumps 23% on trial results
item.description: The Danish company is testing a rival to drugs such as Ozempic and Wegovy which it says may deliver a "better patient experience."

item.title: U.K. May retail sales bounce back with 2.9% rise, beating forecasts
In Spain, where one in five toddlers aged 3 or 4 owns a smartphone, thousands of parents have united to say ‘no’
item.description: The push to control smartphones in Spain comes amid a surge in cases of children viewing online pornography, sharing videos of sexual violence, or in creating deepfakes.

item.title: Analyst calls: Palo Alto Networks to pop more than 20%, Jefferies raises target on industrial stock
item.description: A cybersecurity company and an industrial stock were among the names being talked about by analysts on Friday.

item.title: 'On Watch' podcast: Former Apple exec on how to build a more human workplace
Martha’s Vineyard rentals have gotten so expensive a correctional officer switched to cleaning to earn less so she didn’t lose access to low-income housing
item.description: Landlords stand to make far more money from short-term tourists than from year-round residents. And many island homes are almost always vacant, their wealthy owners uninterested in renting them between fleeting visits.

item.title: SoftBank CEO says AI that is 10,000 times smarter than humans will come out in 10 years
item.description: SoftBank CEO Masayoshi Son laid out his vision for artifical super intelligence, or ASI, that he said would be 10,000 times smarter than humans.

item.title: Bearish Nvidia option bets spike as stock sees record-breaking reversal
Mothers are back at work. Here’s why we shouldn’t be too quick to celebrate
item.description: In the absence of a social safety net, moms end up filling low-wage, no-benefit, dead-end jobs in retail, food service, home health, and childcare.

item.title: CDK's cyber outage hits U.S. auto dealers for second day in a row
item.description: A cyber outage at retail technology and software provider CDK entered its second consecutive day on Thursday, impacting automobile dealers across the U.S.

item.title: Trump social-media stock ‘DJT’ has slid more than 30% over the past 5 days
Why going cashless has turned Sweden from one of the safest countries into a high-crime nation
item.description: In just a decade fraud has almost doubled from just under 9,000 to over 23,000 in 2023.

item.title: Carlsberg tanks 8%, set for largest drop in four years, after Britvic rejects $3.9 billion takeover
U.S. stocks end mostly lower as Nvidia drops sharply
